name: My Wife is the Demonic Cult Leader
summary: Jin Yeomyung, the young master of the Demonic Heaven’s Jin Clan—one of the Six Great Families of the Heavenly Demon Cult.Thankful for having been born with a golden spoon, he's determined to enjoy the sweet, carefree life it brings...
author: Marctempest
